A Mini Bookdown 1 Our Plans Uncovered

A Mini Bookdown Natasa Hogue 1 Our Plans Uncovered Hello! My name is Natasa Hogue and we are looking at delveloping a new method of working across our departments. This new method is adopting platforms, workflows, and practices from the software and development team to use in our own department and to connect (literally) with the other side of the organizaion and infrastructure. #Introduction This chapter is an overview of the methods that we propose to collaboarate on with projects at LIRN. #Steps We will understand Github, Gitpages, and also explore Jekyll and “Course in a Box.” #Summary Overall, we will understand how to leverage these applications and principles within the Library Department team.
